content: लयः [ली-अच्] {@--1@} Sticking, union, adherence. {@--2@} Lurking, hiding. {@--3@} Fusion, melting, solution. {@--4@} Disappearance, dissolution, extinction, destruction; universal destruction (प्रलय); लयंया ‘to be dissolved or destroyed’. {@--5@} Absorption of the mind, deep concentration, exclusive devotion (to any one object); पश्यंती शिवरूपिणं लयवशादात्मानमभ्यागता <ls>Māl. 5. 2</ls>, <ls n="Māl. 5.">7</ls>; ध्यानलयेन <ls>Gīt. 4.</ls> {@--6@} Time in music (of three kinds द्रत, मध्य, and विलंबित); किसलयैः सलयैरिव पाणिभिः <ls>R. 9. 35</ls>; पादन्यासो लयमनुगतः <ls>M. 2. 9.</ls> {@--7@} A pause in music. {@--8@} Rest, repose. {@--9@} A place of rest, abode, habitation; अलया <ls>Śi. 4. 57</ls> ‘having no fixed abode, wandering’. {@--10@} Slackness of mind, mental inactivity. {@--11@} An embrace. {@--12@} The supreme being. {@--13@} The union of song, dance, and instrumental music.
